pkmkdoc.description: This package will install: + SkypeSparkyServer -- listens for Skype text messages to control the Irobot Create and relays these messages to controld + controld -- daemon that controls Irobot Create + shell_check_sparky_irobot.php -- check script to make sure controld is started and running + crontab -- cron entry to schedule shell_check_sparky_irobot.php to run every minute
